title: Leslie Jones bids 'Saturday Night Live' farewell
text:
(CNN) Leslie Jones made her departure from "Saturday Night Live" official Tuesday, posting her farewell on Twitter.

But Jones hadn't confirmed the news until Tuesday, when she wrote about it on social media.

1/5

Yes it's true I am leaving Saturday Night Live. I cannot thank NBC, the producers, writers, and amazing crew enough for making SNL my second home these last five years. Lorne Michaels, you've changed my life in so many ways! Thank you for being my mentor and confidant and for pic.twitter.com/OjRrOx5owj — Leslie Jones 🦋 (@Lesdoggg) September 3, 2019

2/5

always having my back. You not only have my loyalty but you have my heart too! You have shown me skills I never imagined I had. I leave a better performer because of you. To the incredible cast members: I will miss working, creating and laughing with you. pic.twitter.com/SStsLjip1B — Leslie Jones 🦋 (@Lesdoggg) September 3, 2019

"Yes it's true I am leaving Saturday Night Live. I cannot thank NBC, the producers, writers, and amazing crew enough for making SNL my second home these last five years," she tweeted.

"Lorne Michaels, you've changed my life in so many ways! Thank you for being my mentor and confidant and for always having my back," she wrote.

Read More
description: Leslie Jones made her departure from "Saturday Night Live" official Tuesday, posting her farewell on Twitter.
